atmosphere.Name: Atmosphere
atmosphere.Authors: SciresM, tomGER, WerWolv, StevenMaterra, TuxSH, hexkyz
atmosphere.Description:
CFW for the Nintendo Switch. Configured with extras provided by Team AtlasNX's Kosmos, including Kosmos Toolbox, Kosmos Updater, and other optional features such as sigpatches and sysmodules.

Supports loading through Hekate or fusee-primary.

reinx.Name: ReiNX
reinx.Description: A modular custom firmware for the Nintendo Switch. Includes sigpatches, homebrew via album, and more.

Warning.Title: Warning
Warning.Content: ReiNX is missing vital anti-telemetry measures that are included in Atmosphere. This means you may be banned if you ever go online while or after using ReiNX without 90DNS.

cfwoptions.Name: CFW Options
cfwoptions.Footer: These modules are powered by Team AtlasNX's Kosmos v11.7

kosmos_updater.Name: Kosmos Updater
kosmos_updater.Description:
Updater tool for Kosmos-based CFW packages, with customizable channels and bundles, all from within Horizon!

Note: This does not offer the level of customization that SDSetup does.

kosmos_toolkit.Name: Kosmos Toolbox
kosmos_toolkit.Description: CFW customization designed for Kosmos based CFW packages. Includes homebrew menu button customization and hekate autoboot customization, all from within Horizon!

atmos_sigpatch.Name: Enable Signature Patches
atmos_sigpatch.Description: Allows launching of sideloaded NSP files.

ldn_mitm.Name: ldn_mitm
ldn_mitm.Description: MITM kip to allow using ad-hoc local multiplayer titles with switch-lan-play

atmos_sysftpd.Name: Sys-FTPD
atmos_sysftpd.Description: Have an FTP server running in the background on your Switch for managing files on your SD card remotely.

noexs.Name: Noexs
noexs.Description:
A multiplatform graphica remotel debugger for the Nintendo Switch. Useful for viewing and editing memory values at runtime.
Requires the desktop client from the Github.

atmos_xorplay.Name: XorPlay
atmos_xorplay.Description: Play audio in the background on your Nintendo Switch.

atmos_switchpresence.Name: SwitchPresence
atmos_switchpresence.Description: Add automatic Discord rich presence support for Nintendo Switch titles (tell people what you are playing on Discord).

atmos_sysnetcheat.Name: Sys-Netcheat
atmos_sysnetcheat.Description: Remote cheat engine for Switch using Netcat.

reinx_toolkit.Name: ReiNX Toolkit
reinx_toolkit.Description:
Toolkit for ReiNX allowing the installation of AutoRCM, performing NAND backups, and more, all from within Horizon.

This toolkit is only compatible with ReiNX and will not work with other CFWs

appstorenx.Name: Homebrew App Store
appstorenx.Description: Switch app to access view and download homebrew from the SwitchBru Appstore.

hbmenu.Name: Homebrew Menu
hbmenu.Description: Menu to launch all of your Switch NRO homebrew.

pplay.Name: pPlay
pplay.Description: Video player for Switch with support for many popular video formats, subtitles and http streaming.

edizon.Name: EdiZon
edizon.Description: A save file dumper, injector and on-console editor for Horizon, the OS of the Nintendo Switch. Features a scripting framework for easy extension of the tool.

checkpoint.Name: Checkpoint
checkpoint.Description: A fast and simple homebrew save manager for 3DS and Switch written in C++.

tinfoil.Name: Tinfoil
tinfoil.Description: A homebrew application for the Nintendo Switch used to manage and install titles.

zerotwoxci.Name: ZeroTwoXCI
zerotwoxci.Description: A homebrew to install XCI files to NAND/SD as if they were NSP files.

ftpd.Name: FTPD
ftpd.Description: FTP server to allow you to access your Switch's files remotely.

nxshell.Name: NX Shell
nxshell.Description: Work in progress file manager for the Nintendo Switch. Port of 3DShell.

nxthemesinstaller.Name: NxThemes Installer
nxthemesinstaller.Description: Tool to install nxtheme files, a theme format which can be legally distributed.

gagorder.Name: Gag Order
gagorder.Description: A homebrew application which patches the "Supernag" on the Nintendo Switch.

lockpick.Name: Lockpick
lockpick.Description: Dump keys.txt and titlekeys from your Switch.

sdlpop.Name: Prince of Persia
sdlpop.Description: Prince of Persia port using SDL2.

msolarusdx.Name: Mystery of Solarus DX
msolarusdx.Description: A Zelda fan-game in the style of A Link to the Past ported to the Switch. Features a fully fleshed out experience with hours of gameplay.

postalnx.Name: Postal NX
postalnx.Description: Postal port for the Nintendo Switch

pixelpainter.Name: Pixel Painter
pixelpainter.Description: A simple drawing game using LibNX.

pickr.Name: Pickr
pickr.Description: Pickr port for the Nintendo Switch.

spacegamenx.Name: SpaceGameNX
spacegamenx.Description: Simple graphical space shooter ported from the WiiU.

retroarch.Name: RetroArch
retroarch.Description:
Multiplatform emulator with many cores for emulating many different systems. You can individually select each core after enabling this option.

This package comes as an installer that must be run from the Homebrew Launcher before use.

khedgb.Name: khedGB
khedgb.Description: Experimental Gameboy Color emulator for the Switch.

vbanextswitch.Name: VBA Next
vbanextswitch.Description: Gameboy Advanced emulator for the Switch based on libretro and 3DSGBA.

psnes.Name: pSNES
psnes.Description: SNES emulator with a simple, userfriendly interface using the SNES9X core.

pfba.Name: pFBA
pfba.Description: An emulator for multiple arcade systems including Neo-Geo, Capcom, Konami and Cave games. Also supports some consoles such as megadrive, master system and more.

scummvm.Name: ScummVM
scummvm.Description: An emulator for various classic point-and-click adventure games.

retroarch_beetlevb.Name: Mednafen VB
retroarch_beetlevb.Description: Retroarch core for the Virtual Boy.

retroarch_snes9x.Name: SNES9x
retroarch_snes9x.Description: Retroarch core for the SNES. Higher accuracy than the 2010 variant, sacrificing performance.

retroarch_snes9x2010.Name: SNES9x2010
retroarch_snes9x2010.Description: Retroarch core for the SNES. Based on SNES9X 1.52 from 2010, trading accuracy for better performance.

retroarch_picod.Name: PicoDrive
retroarch_picod.Description: Retroarch core for the Master System, SegaCD, Genesis, PICO and 32X.

retroarch_gengxp.Name: Genesis GX Plus
retroarch_gengxp.Description: Retroarch core for the Genesis, Megadrive and Master System.

retroarch_gearsystem.Name: GearSystem
retroarch_gearsystem.Description: Retroarch core for the Master System and Game Gear.

retroarch_o2em.Name: O2em
retroarch_o2em.Description: Retroarch core for the Odyssey and VideoPAC.

retroarch_freeintv.Name: FreeIntv
retroarch_freeintv.Description: Retroarch core for the Mattel Intelivision.

retroarch_gambatte.Name: Gambatte
retroarch_gambatte.Description: Retroarch core for the Gameboy and Gameboy Color.

retroarch_mgba.Name: mGBA
retroarch_mgba.Description: Retroarch core for the Gameboy Advance.

retroarch_vbanext.Name: VBA Next
retroarch_vbanext.Description: Retroarch core for the Gameboy Advance.

retroarch_tgbdual.Name: TGB Dual
retroarch_tgbdual.Description: Retroarch core for the GB/GBC with link cable support

retroarch_gearboy.Name: Gearboy
retroarch_gearboy.Description: Retroarch core for the Gameboy and Gameboy Color.

retroarch_handy.Name: Handy
retroarch_handy.Description: Retroarch core for the Atari Lynx.

retroarch_ngp.Name: Mednafen NeoGeo Pocket
retroarch_ngp.Description: Retroarch core for the Neo Geo Pocket Color.

retroarch_mameplus.Name: MAME2003 Plus
retroarch_mameplus.Description: Retroarch core for emulating thousands of arcade machine titles.

retroarch_fba.Name: Final Burn Alpha
retroarch_fba.Description: Retroarch core for emulating thousands of arcade machine titles.

retroarch_mame2000.Name: MAME2000
retroarch_mame2000.Description: Retroarch core for emulating thousands of arcade machine titles.

retroarch_mame.Name: MAME2003
retroarch_mame.Description: Retroarch core for emulating thousands of arcade machine titles.

retroarch_sgrafx.Name: Mednafen SuperGraFX
retroarch_sgrafx.Description: Retroarch core for PC Engine SuperGraFX titles.

retroarch_crocods.Name: CrocoDS
retroarch_crocods.Description: Retroarch core for Amstrad CPC 6128. Originally created for the Nintendo DS.

retroarch_tyrquake.Name: TyrQuake
retroarch_tyrquake.Description: Retroarch core for the Quake game engine

retroarch_mrboom.Name: mrboom
retroarch_mrboom.Description: Retroarch core for an 8 player Bomberman clone

retroarch_cannonball.Name: Cannonball
retroarch_cannonball.Description: Retroarch core for the Outrun game engine

retroarch_prboom.Name: prboom
retroarch_prboom.Description: Retroarch core for the Doom engine

retroarch_reminiscence.Name: Reminiscence
retroarch_reminiscence.Description: Retroarch core for Delphine Software's Flashback Engine

retroarch_xrick.Name: XRick
retroarch_xrick.Description: Retroarch core for the game Rick Dangerous

fusee-primary.Name: fusee-primary
fusee-primary.Description: Official payload for launching Atmosphere CFW.

hekate.Name: Hekate
hekate.Description: An alternative bootloader for the Nintendo  Switch, with firmware patching, recovery tools, and many more features.

briccmii.Name: briccmii
briccmii.Description: Corrupts (or fixes) the first byte of every BCT's pubkey in BOOT0 so your Nintendo Switch always enters RCM mode (or boots normally).

gptrestore.Name: GPT Restore
gptrestore.Description: Restores the original Nintendo Switch GPT to your eMMC if you somehow messed it up.

biskeydump.Name: biskeydump
biskeydump.Description: Fusee payload to dump BIS keys for eMMC content decryption.

tegrarcmgui.Name: TegraRcmGUI
tegrarcmgui.Description: User-friendly GUI frontend for TegraRCMSmash. Includes fusee payload launching, Linux booting, rajkosto's USB UMS SD Tool and an installer for the necessary driver.

launchpadnx.Name: LaunchPadNX
launchpadnx.Description:
LaunchpadNX lets you select what you want in your CFW, and it builds, compiles, and packages it all up in a drag-and-drop package for your SD Card!

For Windows.

hacgui.Name: HACGUI
hacgui.Description: Easily derive all hactool keys using Hekate NAND backups or memloader with a clean GUI.

nspbuild.Name: nspbuild
nspbuild.Description: Build legal NSP files from libnx homebrew NSO files!

hactool.Name: hactool
hactool.Description: A tool to view information about, decrypt, and extract common file formats for the Nintendo Switch, especially Nintendo Content Archives.

4nxci.Name: 4NXCI
4nxci.Description: A tool for converting XCI (NX Card Image) files to NSP (Nintendo Submission Package).

switchbackupmanager.Name: Switch Backup Manager
switchbackupmanager.Description: Complete Switch backup management tool for both XCI and NSP backups.

fusee-launcher.Name: fusee-launcher
fusee-launcher.Description: Original fusee payload launcher, compatible with Linux.

launchpadnx-linux.Name: LaunchpadNX
launchpadnx-linux.Description:
LaunchpadNX lets you select what you want in your CFW, and it builds, compiles, and packages it all up in a drag-and-drop package for your SD Card!

For Linux.

rekado.Name: Rekado
rekado.Description: Fusee payload launcher for Android. Works without root.

Bundles.Name: Kosmos Defaults
Bundles.Description: Includes the default packages found in Team AtlasNX's Kosmos bundle.

Bundles.Name: ReiNX Defaults
Bundles.Description: Includes all of the packages recommended by the ReiNX guide

Bundles.Name: Minimal
Bundles.Description: Includes just enough to get Atmosphere CFW and homebrew running, with no extras.

luma.Name: Luma3DS
luma.Description: Noob-proof custom firmware, featuring signature patches, region lock bypass, a custom in-game menu and more.

payloads.Name: Payloads
payloads.Footer: Payloads are placed into /sd/luma/payloads for luma chainloading when applicable

openfirminstaller.Name: OpenFirmInstaller
openfirminstaller.Description: Tool to install boot9strap FIRMs to NAND (currently only boot9strap and fastboot3ds).

godmode9.Name: GodeMode9
godmode9.Description: Full access NAND and SD manager with scripting support.

fastboot3ds.Name: FastBoot3DS
fastboot3ds.Description: Custom bootloader for the 3DS with chainloading, NAND backup and restoring, OTP dumping and more. Requires OpenFirmInstaller to install.

homebrew.Name: Homebrew
homebrew.Footer:
Homebrew includes both CIA and 3DSX builds where available, and are only split if their file sizes are large.
CIA files are placed into /sd/cias

hbmenu3ds.Name: Homebrew Menu
hbmenu3ds.Description: A simple, but beautiful, menu that lists 3DSX homebrew applications. Compatible with ninjhax, *hax and Rosalina.

bootntrm3.Name: BootNTR Selector (MODE3)
bootntrm3.Description: Application to load real-time game plugins. Allows things like in-game inventory and stat editing, game patches, and more. Mode3 allows support for extended memory titles on Old 3DS (thus not necessary for N3DS).

bootntr.Name: BootNTR Selector
bootntr.Description: Application to load real-time game plugins. Allows things like in-game inventory and stat editing, game patches, and more.

sharkive.Name: Sharkive
sharkive.Description: GateShark cheatcode manager for Luma3DS v9.1+.

multiupdater.Name: MultiUpdater
multiupdater.Description: Updater for FIRM payloads, CIA applications and other files on the SD card.

fbi.Name: FBI
fbi.Description: Open-source file browser and install for the 3DS. Browse SD card and internal NAND and install CIA files.

ftpdb.Name: FTPDB
ftpdb.Description: FTP server for 3DS to allow remote management of the SD card.

pksm.Name: PKSM
pksm.Description: On-console save editor for GenIV-GenVII Pokemon games. Features in depth stat editing for your Pokemon and an offline Pokemon Bank clone.

jksm.Name: JKSM
jksm.Description: Simplel save manager for 3DS with backup and restore functionality.

checkpoint3ds.Name: Checkpoint
checkpoint3ds.Description: Graphical save manager for 3DS with backup and restore functionality.

3dsident.Name: 3DSident
3dsident.Description: 3DSident is an application for displaying lots of information about your 3DS, including serial number, screen types, firmware versions, and more.

anemone3ds.Name: Anemone3DS
anemone3ds.Description: Theme and splashscreen manager for 3DS with QR code scanning.

mastermind3ds.Name: Mastermind
mastermind3ds.Description: Mastermind clone for the 3DS with CPU and local (same system) multiplayer.

ctrquake.Name: ctrQuake
ctrquake.Description: Quake port for the 3DS with support for online multiplayer. Only includes the shareware episode, unlock full game by placing pak1.pak from the full game into the id1 folder.

zeldaroth.Name: Zelda: Return of the Hylian (CIA)
zeldaroth.Description: Zelda fan-game in the style of A Link to the Past, ported to the 3DS. Features a full quest line with hours of gameplay. CIA release.

zeldaroth_3dsx.Name: Zelda: Return of the Hylian (3DSX)
zeldaroth_3dsx.Description: Zelda fan-game in the style of A Link to the Past, ported to the 3DS. Features a full quest line with hours of gameplay. 3DSX release.

picodrive3ds.Name: PicoDrive 3DS
picodrive3ds.Description: Master System/Mega Drive emulator for the 3DS.
